item.title: CI/CD Labs Part 3: Integrate Jenkins with Openshift
item.description: In this part 3 CI / CD lab the author will document how to integrate Jenkins with the OpenShift. What should be prepared: 1 VM Jenkins Spec: OS: Centos 7.9 (optional) • RAM: 16GB (this will be used until labs finish) • CPU: 4vCPU • HDD: 100GB • Internet connection 1 VM CRC (CodeReady Container) Mini OpenShift Spec: OS: Centos 7.9 (optional) • RAM: 16GB (this will be used until labs finish)
